recipe.title: Beef Tacos
recipe.description: Mexican street-style tacos with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings

ingredients.name: Lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream for topping

steps.descr: Cook onion in a large pan until soft
steps.instructions: Cook onion in a large pan until soft

on_enter.say: Let's start by cooking the onion in a large pan until it's nice and soft. You'll know it's ready when it's translucent and smells sweet.

steps.descr: Add ground beef and cook until browned
steps.instructions: Add ground beef and cook until browned

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the ground beef to the pan. Cook it until it's beautifully browned and you can hear that lovely sizzle.

steps.descr: Stir in cumin, paprika, chili powder, salt and pepper
steps.instructions: Stir in cumin, paprika, chili powder, salt and pepper

on_enter.say: Let's stir in the cumin, paprika, chili powder, and a pinch of salt and pepper. This is where the magic happens, giving our beef that wonderful Mexican flavour.

steps.descr: Add a splash of water and simmer for 5 minutes
steps.instructions: Add a splash of water and simmer for 5 minutes

on_enter.say: Add a splash of water to the pan, then let's simmer it for about five minutes. This will help all those lovely flavours meld together.

steps.descr: Warm tortillas in a dry pan
steps.instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

on_enter.say: Time to warm up those tortillas in a dry pan. Just a few seconds on each side until they're nice and pliable.

steps.descr: Fill tortillas with beef and your favorite toppings
steps.instructions: Fill tortillas with beef and your favorite toppings

on_enter.say: Let's fill those warm tortillas with our delicious beef and your favourite toppings. Get creative and make them your own!
Brilliant! Serve your tacos with some lime wedges on the side. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Warm tortillas make all the difference
Set up a taco bar for fun family dining
Try adding pickled jalapeños for extra kick
